h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Black Wind King
content: Once you see the wisp fly up, retreat away from the center of the arena where the Black Wind King will reappear in a large explosion. Take this time to heal up or use any consumable medicines you think might give you an edge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Wind_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Black Wind Cave Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Black Wind King'.
The content is as follows:
Once you see the wisp fly up, retreat away from the center of the arena where the Black Wind King will reappear in a large explosion. Take this time to heal up or use any consumable medicines you think might give you an edge.
